title: Quiz - Adjectifs de Personnalité
description: Quiz sur les adjectifs de personnalité et leur usage

questions.question: Which personality adjective means 'always on time'?
questions.explanation: 'Punctual' means always arriving or doing things at the expected time.

questions.question: What's the opposite of 'generous'?
questions.explanation: 'Selfish' is the opposite of generous - thinking only of yourself.

questions.question: How do you describe someone who works very hard?
questions.explanation: 'Hardworking' describes someone who puts a lot of effort into their work.
